SEARCH_TIP: Which theme do you want for your new wallpaper?
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Type a search term to start...
FAVORITE_ON_APPLY: Add to favorites automatically when applying
DESCRIPTION: With Papr you search, choose and apply your new wallpaper with very few clicks, besides being able to save your favorites.
FOLDER_NOT_WRITABLE: Without permission to save to this folder, select another.
NEW_VERSION_AVAILABLE: A new version of the program is now available. Would you like to download it now?
FIX_WALLPAPER_PATH: Point to where you want to fix the path of the wallpaper image. Press ESC to cancel.
